channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Building materials fly tipped, 11th October
item.description:
Someone has fly tipped a load of building materials on Gloucester drive outside our building. It has been here for over two weeks. A group of people turned up and took all the floor boards in a van so a small van should be able to pick up what is left.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gloucester Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 12 Hartland Road NW6, 11th October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hartland Road, London

item.title: Council rubbish truck ripped tree branches off and drove away, 11th October
item.description:
We were VERY glad when the council truck came to clear away the flytipped rubbish (sofa) in our corner. HOWEVER they left one large bag of behind. And when they drove away their truck ripped branches off the nearby tree and left them on the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Place, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet
